wikipedia_page.main: George Thomas Barrett (16 March 1934 – 8 March 2014) was an English footballer.A defender, Barrett progressed through the youth ranks at Manchester United but left for Plymouth Argyle in 1957. After three years with Plymouth, Barrett moved to Chester, where he played regularly for a season before joining non-league Cheltenham Town.

response: Thomas or Tom Barrett may refer to:
*Tom Barrett (ice hockey) (died 1996), Canadian ice hockey coach
*Tom Barrett (Michigan politician) (born 1981), member of the Michigan House of Representatives and Michigan Senate
*Tom Barrett (Wisconsin politician) (born 1953), Democratic politician and mayor of Milwaukee, Wisconsin
